```{r}
set.seed(1164)

library(tidyverse)
library(Hmisc)

species_vector = ds_patches %>%
  select(all_of(protist_species_dominance))
colnames(species_vector) = protist_species

correlation_data = species_vector %>%
  as.matrix() %>%
  rcorr(type = "spearman")

to_plot = correlation_data$r
diag(to_plot) = 0

library(corrplot)

corrplot(to_plot, method="circle")
```
